column98: Flight instructor for Greybird. Locations Aarhus, Denmark and Cordoba, Spain.
column99:
Do you have a pilot’s license? Are you looking for new challenges? Are you motivated by helping to develop others? 
 If the answer is “yes” to one or more of those questions, then you might be the new flight instructor at GreyBird. The position is full time at our flying base in Aarhus Airport and Cordoba Airport in Spain. 
   
 About Greybird: 
 GreyBird Pilot Academy educates commercial pilots. Since the school started in 2013 it has grown and is today the leading pilot academy in Denmark with bases in multiple places in Europe. At the moment GreyBird employ more than 40 full time employees in Denmark and Sweden. 
   
 About the Position: 
 You can, as a flight instructor, expect to conduct teaching primarily in flying aboard the aircraft. Occasionally there will also be teaching in the classroom or in the simulator. 
 When you start at Greybird as a student you have high expectations of the quality of the education. Those are expectations that you, as a flight instructor, will help fulfill. This is both an exciting and challenging task. 
   
 We expect that you have: 
 
 ATPL, CPL or PPL certificate 
 Good technical and academic knowledge 
 The ability to work structured and high level of quality awareness 
 Experience in working with people 
 The will to educate in a constructive and professional way 
 A cooperative and welcoming attitude 
 Basic knowledge in IT 
 
   
 We offer: 
 
 Set monthly pay according to qualification & seniority, pension and private healthcare. 
 Predictable schedule 
 Permanent base in Aarhus Airport / Cordoba Airport, Spain 
 Possibility to fly in most of Europe, but particular Denmark and Spain 
 Individual and extensive introduction training 
 Thorough and individualized onboarding 
 Bonding with a monthly depreciation 
 
   
 At GreyBird, our instructors work on a 50/50 rotation between Aarhus and Córdoba while residing permanently in Denmark. During their time in Spain, we provide accommodation. 
   
 For further information, contact CFI Anders Skovsted via ted@greybird.dk or tel.: +4522266020 
 Aarhus Airport: 
 Ny Lufthavnsvej 22 (Aarhus Lufthavn), 8560 Kolind, Denmark 
 Copenhagen Airport: 
 Lufthavnsboulevarden 10, 2770 Kastrup, Denmark 
 +45 70 770 110 
 info@greybird.dk 
 CVR: 35040595 
   
 GreyBird Pilot Academy Sweden and Spain 
 Northern Sweden Base: 
 Köpsvängen 22, Våning 7, 168 67 Bromma Stockholm 
 +46 (0)76-118 90 47 
 hej@greybird.se 
 CVR: 37642606 
 Spanish Base: 
 Ctra. Nacional 437, Km. 5, 8, 14005 Córdoba 
 +34 650 363 469 
 vla@greybird.es 
 VAT: DK3504059
